ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We will pave his way to Difficulty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For him We shall ease the way of adversity,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We shall facilitate for him the way to Hardship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We shall facilitate the path to affliction
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So We will very soon provide him hardship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: We will make smooth for him the path to evil.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: We will facilitate for him the difficult end.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We shall surely ease him to the Hardship;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Surely We will ease his way unto adversity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We shall pave his way to hardship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Unto him therefore We shall Indeed make easy the path to hardship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We will surely ease him toward hardship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We will indeed make smooth for him the path to Misery;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: We will make smooth for him the path for evil;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We shall surely ease for him the Path of Hardship (the Fire).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We will ease his way towards difficulty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: We will ease him toward difficulty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [92:10] We shall surely ease his way, We shall pave for him the way, to hardship, to the Fire;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Surely We will ease his way unto adversity) We shall make easy for him acts of disobedience and refraining from giving to charity, time and again.
